file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.1.0
servers:
  - url: https://api.example.com/v1

info:
  title: Title
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html
  description: Description
  version: 1.0.0

paths:
  /my_post:
    post:
      operationId: my_post
      summary: my_post
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
